0001111101010010 0101011010101001 0 -> sum: 0111010111111011, cout: 0

0110101110100001 0101110010001010 0 -> sum: 1100100000101011, cout: 0

1101100010010010 1101110110001000 1 -> sum: 1011011000011011, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
